_comment: Maps part name patterns (substring match) to density in kg/m³. First match wins. Parts not matching any pattern use the default density (--density flag). Patterns with 'mass_g' use fixed mass (no recursion into children).

_notes.PAHT-CF (Bambu Lab): 1060 kg/m³ at 100% infill (TDS V3), PA12+CF, dark parts color (0.050, 0.050, 0.050)
_notes.DM4340P motor+planetary: 375g (DAMIAO 2025 Product Selection Manual), CAD vol 128.74cm³, eff density 2913
_notes.DM4340 motor (no planetary): 362g (DM-J4340-2EC User Manual V1.0), CAD vol 118.25cm³, eff density 3061
_notes.DM4310 motor: 300g (DM-J4310 User Manual), CAD vol 102.67cm³, eff density 2922
_notes.MGN9 Rail: 380 g/m stainless steel (Circuitist), 57g for 150mm, CAD vol 7.25cm³, eff density 7862
_notes.MGN9 Carriage: ~26g each (Circuitist), CAD vol 3.05cm³, eff density 8519 (simplified CAD with internal ball bearings)
_notes.Aluminum parts: 6061-T6 aluminum, 2700 kg/m³ -- identified by silver color (0.913, 0.913, 0.922) in STEP file
